item.title: Python Quiz 01
item.description: How do you create a array which contains 2 - 10 in one-liner? How do you randomly select 3 numbers from an integer array “‘A”’? How do you create a array of length 13 that for index > 4 its element is any random lowercase vowel(‘a’, ‘e’, ‘i’, ‘o’, ‘u’) but for index in [0, 4], its element is the square root value of the index? How do you you heap sort an array A?
